Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class ebl::ScalarIter< T >

Iterates over the scalars of an Idx in the order that they are laid out in memory ("row major").

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

template<typename T>
ebl::ScalarIter< T >::ScalarIter ( Idx< T > &  idx,
bool  atBeginning = true 
) [inline]

Constructor.

Parameters:
idx is the Idx to iterator over.
atBeginning indicates whether to initialize this iterator at the beginning of the Idx, or at one past the last element.
